tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: These regulations are apparently restrictive of man’s free nature. Furthermore, the system of this world is so framed that every harm is compensated for in some way or the other
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah At-Talaq, Ayah 6?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: He should patiently tolerate such behaviour in others as goes against his nature and discharge his duties towards them in spite of unpleasantness on their part
distractors: This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Only by using his wisdom and consciousness does a man achieve that status which is called (taqwa) in the Islamic law. ’ This statement indicates that the fountainhead of piety (taqwa) is the mind
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah At-Talaq, Ayah 11?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: God sent His messenger ‘so that he might lead those, who have attained to faith and do good deeds, out of darkness into light. Despite this, there are people who do not adopt the way of reform, and who can, therefore, expect nothing but loss on God’s earth
distractors: This verse narrates a historical event
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah At-Talaq, Ayah 12?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: ‘It is God who created the seven heavens and the same number of earths’. According to human knowledge (till the date of this writing) the present earth is an exception in this whole universe
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
